messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As Prime Minister, I have ensured that government has clearly set out our approach to Brexit including: My Lancaster House Speech setting out our 12-point plan for Brexit, The government's Official White Paper on Exiting the EU, The UK's Article 50 Letter to the European Council, and The Great Repeal Bill to ensure a smooth and orderly Brexit.

messages.title: WITH A STRONG NEGOTIATING HAND I CAN DELIVER FOR YOU AND FOR BRITAIN
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand, I can ensure we guarantee our economic security and deliver a free trade deal for British goods and services. We will ensure that God will be providing leadership and taking back control of our money, borders, and laws, whilst still trading and cooperating with Europe.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Val has led many campaigns in Warrington to protect the greenbelt and to stop urban sprawl. Out town and our country needs more housing and Val supports the development of brownfield sites for much needed affordable homes.

Val has pledged to work with Prime Minister Theresa May to deliver on the result of the EU Referendum. Warrington voted to leave the EU and local people know that they need an MP who will stand with Theresa May as she negotiates a good deal on behalf of Britain, not Jeremy Corbyn's candidate.

Val will lead on securing local jobs and industry by ensuring that Warrington has a high-skilled workforce. A strong business community will attract investment into the town and benefit the whole community and economy.
